description.value:
You have learned some of the tricks the fey use to bend primal magic toward illusions and trickery.

Add @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Illusory Disguise]{Illusory Disguise}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Illusory Object]{Illusory Object}, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Illusory Scene]{Illusory Scene}, and @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Veil]{Veil} to your spell list as primal spells.
